name: PingTools Network Utilities
description: This app contains the following tools:   Info - basic information about your device network  Watcher - continuous monitoring of remote resources  Local-Area Network - shows all devices on your network  Ping - ICMP, TCP and HTTP ping  GeoPing - Check resource availability worldwide  Traceroute - UDP or ICMP traceroute tool  iPerf - tool for network performance measurement and tuning  SpeedTest - iPerf based network speed measurement  Port scanner - TCP ports scanner  Whois  UPnP scanner - UPnP\DLNA devices scanner  Bonjour browser  Wi-Fi scanner  Subnet scanner  DNS Lookup  Wake on LAN  IP Calculator  and even more! Enjoy!
